seed_pair.known: Because I want to meet people who speak Spanish.
seed_pair.target: Porque quiero encontrar personas que hablan español.

practice_phrases: I want to learn because you speak Spanish
he wants to come back because we want to meet
él quiere volver porque queremos reunirnos
why are you learning Spanish because I speak very well
por qué estás aprendiendo español porque hablo muy bien
I speak Spanish and you want to learn because you speak very well
hablo español y quieres aprender porque hablas muy bien
she wants to find out what the answer is because he wants to come back
ella quiere descubrir cuál es la respuesta porque él quiere volver
I'm going to try to explain because you speak Spanish
voy a intentar explicar porque hablas español
S0022L01.full_seed_included: NO - missing 'to meet' and 'people who speak Spanish'
S0022L01.note: Fourth conjunction now available - can use with si, y, pero
